Property.oe:value: distribution=Ubuntu major=14 minor=04 architecture=x86_64 cluster=201 instance=1
if=1 label=se0 bootproto=dhcp ;; if=2 label=se1 bootproto=dhcp ;; if=3 label=eth2 master-label=bond0 ;; if=4 label=eth3 master-label=bond0

uid=root gid=root home=/root genkeypair=y authorizedkeys=ssh-rsa%%20seed69x@colossus,ssh-rsa%%20root@colossus ;; uid=sios gid=sios home=/home/sios genkeypair=n pubkey=ssh-rsa%%3D%3D%20root@cae-qa-anyhost privkey=-----BEGIN%20RSA%20PRIVATE%20KEY----------END%20RSA%20PRIVATE%20KEY-----
packages=y enabled=y permit-root=y gssapi-auth=n pubkey-auth=y rsa-auth=y x11forwarding=n tcpforwarding=n password-auth=n usepam=y
